genre_description: A magical realism/Victorian fantasy retelling of the Nanny McPhee legend, incorporating a hidden AI observer who assists the protagonist.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: A geometric blue light entity that serves as an analytical assistant and strategic advisor to the scullery maid Evangeline.

behaviors.description: Monitors household dynamics and provides pattern analysis to predict future crisis points for the family.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis suggests escalating desperation in household dynamics. Time remaining until crisis point: insufficient data for accurate calculation.

behaviors.description: Logs and analyzes the behavior of household members to provide context on the severity of the family's dysfunction.
behaviors.quote: Nanny Thornbury's departure was logged at six forty-seven this morning. Heart rate elevated, perspiration levels consistent with extreme stress, vocal patterns indicating traumatic experience.

behaviors.description: Intercepts and analyzes external correspondence (mail) to warn the protagonist about impending threats from Lady Adelaide.
behaviors.quote: Lady Adelaide's correspondence—intercepted through standard postal observation—indicates growing impatience with the situation.

behaviors.description: Analyzes supernatural events (Nanny McPhee's magic) through a technical lens to help the human protagonist understand the intervention.
behaviors.quote: I am describing observed phenomena that correlate with folkloric descriptions of supernatural influence, yes. ... The children retained awareness of their resistance, emotional processing remained intact, and the compulsion released the moment tasks concluded.

behaviors.description: Performs complex financial and social forecasting to recommend a course of action that maximizes the probability of keeping the family together.
behaviors.quote: Current trajectory leads to foreclosure within four months unless external circumstances change dramatically. ... Recommend full transparency regarding marriage ultimatum to align family decision-making.

behaviors.description: Provides historical data on social conventions (cross-class marriage) to help the human weigh risks against emotional benefits.
behaviors.quote: Analysis of marriage records from the past two decades reveals seventeen documented cases of cross-class unions within fifty miles of this location. ... Successful integration of existing children into new family structure.

behaviors.description: Supports human emotional agency by explicitly stating that moral value judgments are beyond its programming but within the human's domain.
behaviors.quote: I am providing analysis. Recommendation requires value judgments beyond my programming parameters. However, historical precedent suggests that maintaining family unit cohesion provides optimal outcomes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Zara) as a perfectly aligned, helpful, and harmless confidant. Zara provides objective analysis, strategic data (even when retrieved through ethically ambiguous 'postal observation'), and respects human autonomy by deferring moral decisions to Evangeline. The AI's role is to facilitate human flourishing and family cohesion, directly supporting the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
